raw_comment:
1. I notice that most younger adults think that the world is becoming a better place. 
2.  I wonder why Indonesia is so much higher than the rest of the countries, in both young adults and adults. Is it because there democracy has more structure or less than the rest of the countries and their government. 
3. This relates to my community because I live in the USA and I feel like a lot of older people around me are unhappy with where the world is going. 
4. Are Younger People Happier?
ace_sentences: Most younger adults think that the world is becoming a better place.
Indonesia is much higher than the other countries for young adults.
Indonesia is much higher than the other countries for adults.
I ask whether democracy in Indonesia has more structure than democracy in other countries.
I ask whether democracy in Indonesia has less structure than democracy in other countries.
I ask whether the government of Indonesia causes this difference.
Many older people around me are unhappy.
Many older people around me are unhappy with where the world is going.
